title: Will The Stock Market Crash Soon? - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/17/17
itunes:title: Will The Stock Market Crash Soon? - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/17/17
description:
George Noory and investment advisor Brad Lamensdorf discuss whether the current bull market can last, or if there will be a stock market crash soon that could wreck the U.S. economy.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
